data.eml:eml: Description of Panagrellus ulmi sp. n. (Rhabditida, Panagrolaimidae) from Iran, and comments on the species of the genus and its relatives

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Abolafia, Joaquín, Alizadeh, Mehrdad, Khakvar, Reza (2016): Description of Panagrellus ulmi sp. n. (Rhabditida, Panagrolaimidae) from Iran, and comments on the species of the genus and its relatives. Zootaxa 4162 (2): 245-267, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4162.2.3
